fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.continuous

Class MorphingVertexMapping

  • Object
    • MorphingVertexMapping

  • public class MorphingVertexMapping
extends Object
    A class that maps the vertices of an initial geometry to the vertices of a final geometry in a morphing process.
    Author:
    Guillaume Touya
